Metadata: A shared future: Washington County in 2020
program reports (annual, progress, planning reports, etc)

Washington County's rural open spaces, village centers, and clean beaches and streams are assets to the people of Rhode Island, both physically and economically. In an effort to better manage the rapid development that is now occurring, the Washington county Regional Planning Council has asked for public opinions and visions regarding water, land use, housing, transportation, and the economy. This interim report summarizes the goals and courses of action recently proposed, and encourages further public participation.
